Trade/Device Name(s): S TEST Reagent Cartridge Alanine Amino Transferase (ALT)
S TEST Reagent Cartridge Aspartate Amino Transferase (AST)
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Photometric measurement (NADH absorbance decrease at 340 nm)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Hitachi S TEST reagent cartridges for ALT and AST enzymatic activity measurement on Hitachi Clinical Analyzer E40.
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative measurement of ALT and AST enzyme activity in serum, lithium heparin plasma, K3 EDTA plasma, and sodium citrate plasma, aiding diagnosis and treatment of certain liver and heart diseases; intended for use on Hitachi Clinical Analyzer E40 in clinical or physician office laboratories.
